item.title: MCP Documentation Entry Point
item.description: START HERE: Multi-Agent Control Platform Documentation Welcome to the MCP Documentation System This document is the mandatory first stop for all team members working on the Multi-Agent Control Platform. It will direct you to the information you need based on your role and the current project focus. Current Project Focus üîç CURRENT FOCUS: Phase 1 Implementation - Core Infrastructure We are currently focused on implementing the core infrastructure components of the MCP platform, including the FSM framework, agent interfaces, NATS messaging integration, and basic health monitoring.
